name: Bedtime (TheDre)
description:
As a child I kept encountering strange things during bedtime, maybe it was because I was afraid of the dark or maybe there was something more going on?

With this small project of mine, I wanted to bring this kind of experience of a childs 'fanatasy' forward and hopefully reach you with it.

I hope you will like it as I would also appreciate feedback!

Thank you for your time and enjoy the game ^^
